item.title: ~ Help ~ On Delay Of Clicking ~ Help ~
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

[quote=“Enz0, post:12, topic:40418”]///////////\to post above////////
I wanted to make random log clicking so that it wouldn’t look like a autoer was burning the logs, And as I stated above a bunch of times I DOWNLOAD SRL BUT MY COMPUTER CAN NOT EXTRACT THE FILES FROM IT.[/quote]

WHY RANDOM LOG CLICKING???
Its not gonna make a difference wether you get banned or not.
How could people know your a autoer lighting logs?They dont!..
and can you post the script you remade please?

Read full topic

item.title: ~ Help ~ On Delay Of Clicking ~ Help ~
item.dc:creator: @Enz0 Enz0
item.description:
@Enz0 wrote:

///////////\to post above////////
I wanted to make random log clicking so that it wouldn’t look like a autoer was burning the logs, And as I stated above a bunch of times I DOWNLOAD SRL BUT MY COMPUTER CAN NOT EXTRACT THE FILES FROM IT.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 07:03:59 PM[/size][hr]Well I am about to try your script junkj I just got SRL to work…I woner if your script does[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 07:28:59 PM[/size][hr]your script works…just needs a longer delay[br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2006, 07:32:49 PM[/size][hr]I think i got it to work you just need the timing to be 2000-2500 I tryed at 2000 and it just did it the extra 500 is for if you dont always make a fire as quickly as the others

item.title: ~ Help ~ On Delay Of Clicking ~ Help ~
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

it doesnt make you money,
and why would you make it click logs not in order?
Randoms???why do you need randoms for that?
all you have to do is sit on your chair and watch them make fire.Itll stop the script automaticly
so you can just keep chopping then script then chop and script and thats it.
I might make a script that will chop,burn chop and burn so it will be easier.
And if you want it them to find randoms put findnormalrandoms; in the begining of the procedure.
sheesh :eek:

Anything else you wanna ask for? [br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 07:48:34 PM[/size][hr]fixed that dumb version of the srl script and made a better one!
with no wait times and nothing here it is!

program FireMaker;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/firemaking.scar}

procedure Burn;
begin
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(2)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(3)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(4)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(5)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(6)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(7)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(8)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(9)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(10)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(11)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(12)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(13)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(14)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(15)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(16)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(17)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(18)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(19)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(20)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(21)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(22)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(23)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(24)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(25)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(26)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(27)
lightwait;
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(28)
terminatescript;
writeln('built all fires and script is finished');
writeln('thank you for using this');
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
Cleardebug;
setupsrl;
Burn;
end.

still dont have srl dowload? it here

www.villu-reborn.com

item.title: ~ Help ~ On Delay Of Clicking ~ Help ~
item.dc:creator: @Enz0 Enz0
item.description:
@Enz0 wrote:

[quote=“ry024_sk8ter, post:9, topic:40418”]enzo that script you made up top if you are using on your main you WILL get banned…just from the looks of it its not random at all…my advice to you is no matter how bad you want to dont use scripts on your main…they eventually get banned…i learned the hard way =( just use scripts on lv 20 noobs to make $ for your main…[/quote]I am not using it on my main, Although I just found out, about SCAR I am not that dumb I am using it on my Pure skiller who I could care less If he got banned. Also Its my first script I am going to add randoms to it so it doesn’t click on the same order all the time, also it click different places in the logs to make more random.

AND HOW DOES FIRE MAKING MAKE YOU MONEY???

item.title: ~ Help ~ On Delay Of Clicking ~ Help ~
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

I finnaly got it!!

program FireMaker;
{.include srl/srl.scar}


const
howlong=8000;   //how long it takes to build a fire

procedure Burn;
begin
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(2)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(3)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(4)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(5)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(6)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(7)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(8)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(9)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(10)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(11)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(12)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(13)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(14)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(15)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(16)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(17)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(18)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(19)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(20)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(21)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(22)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(23)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(24)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(25)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(26)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(27)
wait(howlong)
useitem(1)
wait(1000)
useitem(28)
terminatescript;
writeln('built all fires and script is finished');
writeln('thank you');
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
Cleardebug;
setupsrl;
Burn;
end.

there ya go!

If something messes up and you cant seem to find the error pm.
Must stand in a line of nothing infront of you nor behind you.
For the howl ong thing,put 3 seconds more then you usually
make a fire because its a different time all the time maybe sometimes.Do it anyway.

item.title: ~ Help ~ On Delay Of Clicking ~ Help ~
item.dc:creator: @Enz0 Enz0
item.description:
@Enz0 wrote:

I got this down, I just need to know how to make it so that theres a delay on the clicking cause it does what I need it to do just super fast.
I also know that this

Wait(50+Random(50))

Is the part that needs the be changed, Also I don’t feel like going though and changing all of them could I use like NOTEPAD or MS word to change it? if so Could one of you do it? ;D

[code]// ScriptName = Pyro tech
// Author = Enz0
// Description = It makes fires.
// Version = 1.0
// Date = December 30th, 2006
// Comments = Don’t Burn your self

program autofiremaker;

//Start with your tinderbox in the first spot of your inventory//
//Make sure you have a clear line to the west to fire make in//

Begin
//Backpack Click//
Movemousesmooth(648,189)
Wait(50+Random(50))
clickmouse(648+Random(10),189+random(10),true)
wait(50+random(50))
//First Space//
Movemousesmooth(583,228);
wait(50+random(50));

wait(50+Random(50));
